title: Josh Tongue
text: Joshua Charles Tongue (born 15 November 1997) is an English <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er who plays for <a href="Worcestershire%20County%20Cricket%20Club">Worcestershire County Cricket Club</a>. A right-arm <a href="Fast%20bowling">fast-medium pace</a> bowler, who also bats right-handed. He made his <a href="First-class%20cricket">first-class</a> debut for Worcestershire against the Oxford MCC University side in March 2016. He made his <a href="List%20A%20cricket">List A</a> debut for Worcestershire in the <a href="2017%20Royal%20London%20One-Day%20Cup">2017 Royal London One-Day Cup</a> on 5 May 2017.
